column2: Greetings! Not often we get new people here! New people mean new customers! Come down to our blacksmith if you need anything done.
I can't imagine you'd think I'd like this, so all I've got is you're trying to piss me off. NOT a good idea.
Yeah this is no good, no thanks.
You don't just go giving away random stuff to people.
Now this is how you give a gift. I like this a lot, thank you.
